english_source: In April 2020, he was one of the first few people in Ottawa to be diagnosed with COVID-19. He was covered by regional and international media as a cautionary tale to the youth to take the symptoms seriously and thus avoid community transfer.[11][12]
target1_text: Mnamo Aprili 2020, alikuwa mmoja wa watu wachache wa kwanza huko Ottawa kukutwa na virusi vya COVID-19 . Aliangazwa na vyombo vya habari vya kikanda na kimataifa kama mfano wa tahadhari kwa vijana kuchukua dalili kwa umakini na hivyo epuka uhamishaji wa jamii. [1] [2]
target2_text: Mnamo Aprili 2020, alikuwa mmoja wa watu wachache wa kwanza huko Ottawa kukutwa na COVID-19 . Alifunikwa na vyombo vya habari vya kikanda na kimataifa kama hadithi ya tahadhari kwa vijana kuchukua dalili kwa umakini na hivyo epuka uhamishaji wa jamii. [1] [2]

english_source: Jeanjos creates his own label, Fight for your Dreams, in August 2019. Under his new label, he releases his first song entitled "Nd'Uwunesha" (which means "I am victorious").[8]
target1_text: Jeanjos Parfait huunda lebo yake mwenyewe, Pigania ndoto zako, mnamo Agosti 2019. Chini ya lebo yake mpya, anatoa wimbo wake wa kwanza uitwao "Nd'Uwunesha " (ambayo inamaanisha "mimi ni mshindi"). [1]
target2_text: Jeanjos huunda lebo yake mwenyewe, Pigania ndoto zako, mnamo Agosti 2019. Chini ya lebo yake mpya, anatoa wimbo wake wa kwanza uitwao " Nd'Uwunesha " (ambayo inamaanisha "mimi ni mshindi"). [1]

english_source: Jeanjos Parfait is a former Burundian professional football player. With his two big brothers, he played in the team called Maika and was nicknamed "Bebeto" because of the Brazilian football star Bebeto, forming in the 1990s the offensive duo of Brezil with Romário. In 2005, he signed a contract in the first division of the F.C. Fuso in Gitega, currently the political capital of Burundi.[1]
target1_text: Jeanjos Parfait ni mchezaji wa zamani wa mpira wa miguu mtaalam wa Burundi . Akiwa na kaka zake wawili wakubwa, alicheza katika timu inayoitwa Maika na aliitwa "Bebeto" kwa sababu ya bebeto nyota wa Brazil, akiunda miaka ya 1990 mchezaji alinalomchukiza la Brezil pamoja Romário . Mnamo 2005, alisaini mkataba katika mgawanyiko wa kwanza wa FC Fuso huko Gitega, kwa sasa ni mji mkuu wa kisiasa wa Burundi . [1]
target2_text: Jeanjos Parfait ni mchezaji wa zamani wa mpira wa miguu mtaalam wa Burundi . Akiwa na kaka zake wawili wakubwa, alicheza katika timu inayoitwa Maika na aliitwa "Bebeto" kwa sababu ya bebeto nyota wa Brazil, akiunda miaka ya 1990 duo linalomchukiza la Brezil na Romário . Mnamo 2005, alisaini mkataba katika mgawanyiko wa kwanza wa FC Fuso huko Gitega, kwa sasa ni mji mkuu wa kisiasa wa Burundi . [1]

english_source: Under the influence of his big brother, Jeanjos later gave up the champinnat after playing only three games to become a chorist in the Living Church of Gitega. He was baptized the same year under the name of Jean Joseph. He learned to play the basic guitar and work as a sound engineer for the choir in which he sang.[1]
target1_text: Chini ya ushawishi wa kaka yake mkubwa, Jeanjos baadaye aliachana na shirikisho baada ya kucheza michezo mitatu tu ili kuwa chorist katika Kanisa La Living la Gitega . Alibatizwa mwaka huo huo chini ya jina la Joseph Joseph . Alijifunza kucheza gitaa la msingi na kufanya kazi kama mhandisi wa sauti kwa kwaya ambayo aliimba. [1]
target2_text: Chini ya ushawishi wa kaka yake mkubwa, Jeanjos baadaye aliachana na champinnat baada ya kucheza michezo mitatu tu ili kuwa chorist katika Kanisa La Living la Gitega . Alibatizwa mwaka huo huo chini ya jina la Joseph Joseph . Alijifunza kucheza gitaa la msingi na kufanya kazi kama mhandisi wa sauti kwa kwaya ambayo aliimba. [1]

english_source: Emilian Patrick Polino (born 11 May 1981) is a boxer from Tanzania who qualified for the 2008 Olympics at bantamweight.
target1_text: Emilia Patrick Polino (amezaliwa 11 Mei 1981) ni boxer kutoka Tanzania aliyehitimu michezo ya Olimpiki ya 2008 huko bantamweight.
target2_text: Emilia Patrick Polino (amezaliwa 11 Mei 1981) ni bondia kutoka Tanzania aliyehitimu michezo ya Olimpiki ya 2008 kwenye ngazi ya bantam.

english_source: Eugen Elishiringa Mwaiposa (23 November 1960 – 2 June 2015) was a Tanzanian CCM politician and Member of Parliament for Ukonga constituency from 2010 to 2015.[1]
target1_text: Eugen Elishiringa Mwaiposa (23 Novemba 1960 - 2 Juni 2015) alikuwa mwanasiasa wa CCM wa Tanzania na Mjumbe wa Bunge la jimbo la Ukonga kutoka 2010 hadi 2015. [1]
target2_text: Eugen Elishiringa Mwaiposa (23 Novemba 1960 - 2 Juni 2015) alikuwa mwanasiasa wa kike wa CCM wa Tanzania na Mbunge wa jimbo la Ukonga kutoka 2010 hadi 2015. [1]

english_source: Baba Sy (1935 in Donaye, Senegal – August 20 1978) was a Senegalese international draughts player and the first world champion from Africa.
target1_text: Baba Sy (1935 huko Donaye, Senegal - Agosti 20 1978) alikuwa mchezaji wa bao wa Senegal na bingwa wa kwanza wa ulimwengu kutoka bara la Afrika.
target2_text: Baba Sy (1935 huko Donaye, Senegal - Agosti 20 1978) alikuwa mchezaji wa densi wa kimataifa wa Senegal na bingwa wa kwanza wa ulimwengu kutoka Afrika.

english_source: Irene Aurelia Tarimo (born Kilimanjaro, published as T. A. Irene) is an environmental scientist, and the Head of Department of Environmental Studies at the Open University of Tanzania. She is also a lecturer and researcher at OUT.[1] She was a director of the Lindi Regional Centre of the Open University of Tanzania for almost nine years.
target1_text: Irene Aurelia Tarimo (mzaliwa wa Kilimanjaro, aliyechapishwa kama TA Irene) ni mwanasayansi wa mazingira, na Mkuu wa Idara ya Masomo ya Mazingira katika Chuo Kikuu Huria cha Tanzania . Yeye pia ni mhadhiri na mtafiti huko OUT. [1] Alikuwa mkurugenzi wa Kituo cha Lindi Mkoa wa Open Chuo Kikuu cha Tanzania kwa karibu miaka tisa.
target2_text: Irene Aurelia Tarimo (mzaliwa wa Kilimanjaro, akijulikana kama T. A. Irene) ni mwanasayansi wa mazingira, na Mkuu wa Idara ya Masomo ya Mazingira katika Chuo Kikuu Huria cha Tanzania . Yeye pia ni mhadhiri na mtafiti huko OUT. [1] Alikuwa mkurugenzi wa Kituo cha Lindi Mkoa wa Open Chuo Kikuu cha Tanzania kwa karibu miaka tisa.
